title: The Enchanted Bathroom
description: Sandy Warner finds more than she bargained for in the Three Lillies bathroom. Overcome by the moans and groans from the couple in the next stall, she begins to fantasize a hunk obeying her every wish.Richard Leere didnâ€™t expect to find the woman of his dreams flustered in his restaurant. After a surprise grab to his groin, he smiles.Sandy, unsure if the man before her is real or her imaginary hunk, steps back. After an embarressing moment, she now must decide if she should make a move while the smile is plastered on his face, or apologize and walk out with her dignity.
author: Liam Stalls
